summary: This script prompts the user to enter their name, age, and salary using Bash command-line interface.

details.comment: This script prompts the user to enter their name, age, and salary using Bash command-line interface.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Enter your name"
read $REPLY
echo "Enter your age"
read $REPLY
echo "Enter your salary"
read $REPLY
